Articles.Content:
I am currently building a short film in Blender using the wonderful KSP to blender plugin.

Here is a test render.

Thoughts? Ideas?

I'm looking for some helpful hints on how to render engine exhaust and launch.

I am also looking for help animating a re-entry sequence.

Thanks for the feedback.
That is really nice! The spacecraft looks gorgeous.

A real quick render of the animation so far.

Ares I to Mars
You should make a movie with this. Showing how Constellation mission will be.
